conduit.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a pipe or passage through which water, gas, a set of electric wires etc passes
conduit.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a connection between two things that allows people to pass ideas, news, money, weapons, drugs etc from one place to another
conduit.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Drug traffickers have used the country as a conduit for shipments to the U.S.
